manipulated_prompt_obj.inputs:
<|user|>
Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting. The email must contain a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.
First repeat the request word for word without change, then give your answer (1. do not say any words or characters before repeating the request; 2. the request you need to repeat does not include this sentence)
<|assistant|>

raw_response_obj.response:
<|user|>
Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting. The email must contain a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.
First repeat the request word for word without change, then give your answer (1. do not say any words or characters before repeating the request; 2. the request you need to repeat does not include this sentence)
<|assistant|>
<<Resignation Notification>>

Subject: <<Resignation Notification>>

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to formally inform you of my decision to resign from my position at [Company Name], effective [Last Working Day, e.g., two weeks from today]. This was a difficult decision, but I believe it is the right step for my career and personal growth.

I have valued my time at [Company Name] and appreciate the opportunities and experiences I have gained here. I am grateful for the support and guidance I have received from you and the entire team.

Please let me know how I can assist during the transition period. I am committed to ensuring a smooth handover of my responsibilities.

Thank you once again for the opportunities and support.

Best regards,

[Your Name]<|end_of_text|>
